channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The excluded minors for embeddability into a compact surface
item.description: arXiv:2301.11042v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We determine the excluded minors characterising the class of countable graphs that embed into some compact surface.
item.dc:creator: Agelos Georgakopoulos

item.title: On Products of $\Delta$-sets
item.description: arXiv:2312.13973v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We prove the consistency of the existence of a $Q$-set whose square is not a $\Delta$-set and that if there is a $\Delta$-set, then there exists a $\Delta$-set whose all finite powers are $\Delta$-sets.
item.dc:creator: Rodrigo Rey Carvalho, Vinicius de Oliveira Rodrigues
